message: Let's be fair, Bob. This gives us both a good amount.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the inflation hits you harder.
Bob, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical outcome.  I'm willing to accept this to avoid further losses from inflation.
I'm willing to take a bit more, since inflation is on my side.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a small hit to end this. This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. Inflation is really hurting you now.
Okay, Bob, you got me. You're ruthlessly exploiting the situation.  This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
You keep saying it's your final offer, but I think you'll take a worse deal rather than get nothing. Am I right?
You're right, Bob. I'd rather take a smaller piece than nothing at all. This is truly my final offer.  If you reject it, I'm accepting your next offer, no matter what.
I believe you when you say you'll accept my next offer. So, I'm taking a bit more. You're still better off than getting nothing.
